caption:
“He must increase; I must decrease.” — John 3:30

Reflection:
The more we fade, the more divine light fills the void. Humility opens the door for holiness to dwell.

Commentary:
John’s words teach the essence of surrender — to let ego give way so that grace can grow. Greatness is found in letting God take center stage.
